name: Yuxiao Sun
tagline: I am a graduate student at the University of Chicago reading M.A. in social science. My concentrations are computational linguistics and machine learning.
body:
**PASSION:** pattern recognition & causal inference

**SKILL:** Python/R (intermediate) for programming and natural language processing; Stata/SPSS (advanced) for   statistical analysis; MATLAB/Maple (intermediate) for mathematical modelling; SQL (intermediate) for database; Tableau/GIS (basic) for visualization; JavaScript/Html (basic) for web development.

**LANGUAGE:** English/Fluent; Mandarin Chinese/Fluent; French/Beginner
 

**Working Projects:**

1. [Study on Media Bias](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/hwcfpp/tree/master/project)

2. [Machine Learning Pipeline/Toolkit](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/capp-455136/tree/master/mlpipe)

3. [US Nonprofits Database](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/USngo)

4. [Study on Nonprofits' Mission Statements and Fund Raising Capacity](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/USngomission)

5. [Seismos: Nonprofits Fiscal Stability Index](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/seismos)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
